text: Serena Williams won the title by defeating Jennifer Capriati 6–2, 4–6, 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== The first four seeds received a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Official results archive (ITF) * Official results archive (WTA) Category:State Farm Women's Tennis Classic Category:2002 WTA Tour
title: 2002 State Farm Women's Tennis Classic – Singles
